Detailed Description

Tiled patch clustering algorithm.

Input Parameters

Definitions:

  • tile_size Tile size in the index space of the tag level.
  • coalesce_boxes Whether to coalesce boxes after clustering. This can lead to clusters that are bigger than specified tile size.
  • coalesce_boxes_from_same_patch Whether to coalesce tiled-boxes that originate from the same tag patch. This can reduce number of tiles and lead to clusters bigger than tile size.
  • allow_remote_tile_extent Whether tile may extend to remote tag patches. If false, tiles will be cut at process boundaries, resulting in completely local tiles. If true, allow tiles to cross process boundaries where, resulting in less tile fragmentation. If false, clusters' extent can depend on how tag level is partitioned.
  • DEV_debug_checks Whether to run expensive checks for debugging.

const hier::IntVector &  max_gcw 
) [virtual]

Implement the mesh::BoxGeneratorStrategy interface method of the same name.

Create a set of boxes that covers all integer tags on the patch level that match the specified tag value. Each box will be at least as large as the given minimum size and the tolerances will be met.

Implements SAMRAI::mesh::BoxGeneratorStrategy.

References SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::begin(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::end(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::findOverlapBoxes(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::front(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevel::getBoxes(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevel::getGridGeometry(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevel::getMPI(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevel::getRefinementRatio(), SAMRAI::hier::IntVector::getZero(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::isEmpty(), SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::makeTree(), MPI_MAX, NULL_USE, SAMRAI::tbox::plog, SAMRAI::hier::BoxContainer::size(), TBOX_ASSERT, TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY4, and TBOX_ERROR.
